TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mahamadou_Issoufou, title = Mahamadou_Issoufou, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahamadou_Issoufou} }

S.FORM: Mahamadou Issoufou ryax sa tay nqu tay, Mahamadou Issoufou, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1951) mrhuw Niger ta' misuw hya' ga Mahamadou Issoufou, aring ryax tay 7 squ byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2011 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
